tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  email TEXT UNIQUE,
  phone_number TEXT,
  birthdate DATE,
  loyalty_points INT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE LoyaltyRewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reward_name VARCHAR(100),
    points_required INT,
    description TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_profiles(customer_id),
    prefered_category VARCHAR(50),
    prefered_brand VARCHAR(50),
    prefered_product VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE loyalty_rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_profiles(customer_id),
    reward_type VARCHAR(50),
    reward_description TEXT,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE points_redeemed (
    redemption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_profiles(customer_id),
    points_redeemed INT,
    redemption_date TIMESTAMP,
    reward_redeemed VARCHAR(100)
);
